Omggg! This blazer is even more beautiful in person! So soft, a little thick but not too thick and seems like nice quality. Prom is Saturday, ordered this jacket on Wednesday, delivered on Thursday evening! Quick and easy!

I am 5'9" and 140lbs, and the small size fit me very well! I got multiple compliments on the street just walking to the party (about the look and the fit once I told them it was straight off amazon), and many compliments at the party. The sleeves were a tad short but I'd prefer that than being too long.  The material is very soft almost suede-like.  Outside pockets are sewn shut and fake, but there are two inside pockets, and a nice inner material pattern. The only surprise was that the buttons were not the ones in the picture, and instead some kind of a reddish bronze with horses or something, and did not match the jacket. They were also sewn in upside down... but overall it still looked fine. There's no way the gold-leaf pattern will hold up over time, but it's great for looking flashy at parties.  Definitely worth the money for me.
This jackets looks pretty good for the price! If you’re a guy with some extra weight in the belly area, I’d recommend ordering 2 sizes up from your normal size.
